snippet.title: Clock Tower - LRG3 Announcement Video
snippet.description: The groundbreaking 16-bit survival-horror game, Clock Tower, returns on modern consoles and PC! Experience classic point-and-click gameplay powered by Limited Run Games’ Carbon Engine as you attempt to escape the Barrows family manor and evade the murderous Scissorman, accompanied by new features like an animated intro, motion-comic cutscenes, theme song by Mary McGlynn, and more. Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox, and PC in early 2024. https://wayforward.com/wayforward-announces-clock-tower-for-consoles-and-pc/
